practice_phrases.target: I am trying to speak carefully now

practice_phrases.known: 我想让你仔细地读这个故事
practice_phrases.target: I want you to read the story carefully

practice_phrases.known: 我开始今天仔细地考虑一些事
practice_phrases.target: I started to think about something carefully today

practice_phrases.known: 我想今天早上仔细地记住你说的话
practice_phrases.target: I want to remember what you said carefully this morning

practice_phrases.known: 我努力仔细地说因为我不确定该说什么
practice_phrases.target: I am trying to speak carefully because I am not sure what to say

practice_phrases.known: 我想仔细地向你解释一些事但我还没准备好
practice_phrases.target: I wanted to explain something to you carefully but I was not ready
